content.text:
# King Jingmin of Wei

King Jingmin of Wei (; died 228 BC; r. 242â€“228 BC), personal name Wei Wu (), was the penultimate king of the Wei state. He was a son of his predecessor, King Anxi. He made an alliance with the states of Han, Zhao, Yan and Chu against the Qin state. This alliance failed with Han's destruction by Qin in 230 BC.
